# Compare collision detection with distance vs distance squared

Compare these figures (in release mode, on R9 3950X)

## Distance, using square root calculation #

1, 0, 0, 112
1001, 1, 1001000, 62
2001, 6, 4002000, 62
3001, 13, 9003000, 62
4001, 24, 16004000, 40
5001, 37, 25005000, 26
6001, 52, 36006000, 22
7001, 73, 49007000, 20
8001, 95, 64008000, 12
9001, 121, 81009000, 12
10001, 152, 100010000, 14

## squared_distance, without calculating sqrt

1001, 1, 1001000, 80
2001, 4, 4002000, 66
3001, 11, 9003000, 66
4001, 19, 16004000, 49
5001, 30, 25005000, 32
6001, 43, 36006000, 22
7001, 59, 49007000, 17
8001, 77, 64008000, 12
9001, 97, 81009000, 10
10001, 121, 100010000, 17
